Me!

Almost done exams do the boogey ya ya ya!! Hit the road jack don't u cum back no more no more no more no more hit the road jack! I am waiting on the doctor to get back the xrays for my very bad knees i'm really nervous to see wut i got but o well can't change them any way... i g2g still got another exam to write.!!

Hit the road Jack don't u cum back no more no more no more no more hit the road jack and don't u cum back no more!!! Gone like the wind!!!

Wow its almost Christmas and its very hard to believe, we've all been so busy. I wonder how many people stop to think about the true meaning of Christmas. I was singing at my church in the choir and this kinda important guy said he would be there. I waited for what seemed forever but he never came. My heart wanted to break. Hes just a friend but a friend that means soo much to me. I never thought that i could ever make a friend who was a guy ever again but i was wrong. If only he knew how much he ment to me... doesnt matter. Mime is just a friend and i noe that i will always love him and i will always hold him close to my heart and love him until hes ready to noe that I love him. 
Well this Christmas is not what I expected it to be. I expected no presents a small dinner and it turned out to be a holiday full of trusting for the Lord to provde. I hope that your Christmas is equally as special. Merry Christmas Mime. Merry Christmas to all and a blessed new year!

wow i got grounded cause i had "attitude". Dear me this is sad i am sooooooo bored. sure i didn't want to watch the movie that they are seeing but i am still sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo bored. Save me please, bring me back to the world of sane ppl. I think i just got the role of the cyco

Well Merry Christmas everyone! It has been snowing since 5 o'clock but it is finally staying on the ground. Christmas is my fave. time of year, for my family it is full of life long traditions that i noe we will do with our children. My fave. tradition is christmas baking with Mom. I'm beginning to like highskool. and all my friends, and best friends, yes dave that includes you too. I still miss my old friends alot but i finnally feel like i belong somewhere. It's a great family. G2 spilt luv ya all.

blondieinlove4ever

p.s. the mime is still hot!!!!

I went out with kids from my church. The ppl are like y did u have a baby so young. I was like hes not mine alright. One of the guys was a mime and I have this huuuuuuuuuuuge crush on me... I wonder if he likes me

I used to love Halloween and now its not all that trilling..no candy..no costume but I still get to carve my pumpkin which I did last night and I made Bob the tomato from Vegetales!!Have you seen vegetales they are the best! any ways I wish I had a guy who was more than just a friend but you dont need to knoe that do you. I want to see how many ppl will add a coment. This is going to be fun
